backend/main.mo: Defines itinerary types and generates mock itineraries with day plans, food spots, and transport, returning formatted text.
feature_evidence.json: Records evidence for a frontend feature update related to Recommended Transport text and identifies affected file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based Goa-themed color variables and light/dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Goa Car Rental title and root div loading main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the LandingPage component as the appâ€™s root UI.
frontend/src/components/GoaPlanner/Itine: Parses itinerary text into sections and displays days, hotels, food spots, and transport with styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/GoaPlanner/Landi: Hosts header, trip form, and results using local mock itinerary generation with Goa Car Rental branding.
frontend/src/components/GoaPlanner/TripP: Form UI to select duration, budget, travel type, and location, triggering itinerary generation.
frontend/src/constants/whatsapp.ts: Exports a WhatsApp contact URL with a preset Goa rental inquiry message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and identity persistence. Wraps AuthClient setup with custom idle behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useMockPlanTrip.ts: Defines a React Query mutation that simulates trip planning using local mock data, adding an artificial delay before returning a generated plan.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines a Goa-themed color system with light/dark variants and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root App component.
Contains 5-day Goa itinerary data and budget-specific hotel, food, and transport datasets used for mock trip planning.
frontend/src/mock/generatePlan.ts: Generates a text-based itinerary by slicing day plans based on duration and appending budget-specific recommendations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme with custom Goa color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for the Goa Car Rental UI and mock itinerary system.
